About Me

  • A computer science engineer turned profitable trader—this is my story. In my 2nd year of engineering, I realized I had bigger dreams, to learn, to earn, to trade, to invest, and to teach. I started learning online about the nitty-gritty of the financial industry and trading while finishing my degree. When the lockdown was lifted, I started offline classes to learn more and trade better. I have always been a quick learner, and with dedication and hard work, I am now a profitable trader! After all this knowledge and experience, I decided to share my knowledge with my students so that they can also find success in the world of finance.
